Description: Pottery ostracon bearing Coptic. Conatains a Eucharistic prayer, 'Prayer of evening offering of incense'.
Curator's comments: EA 5876 + EA 14180. Studied with a view to publicaiton by Mihálykó 2021.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.24, pl.18)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (111811) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/111811)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 18:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2014)
